channel.title: Need makeadmin command
channel.description:
I need the command makeadmin for eclipse 639 Help me out?
Thank you :D
I'm gonna be a little retarded here (an attempt at the command) if if (command[0].equals("makeadmin") && player.getRights() < 4 castOn = player.something whatever sendMessageto(+playername+); Ok.. so I suck at commands I am currently working on variables on my tutorials and I'm getting better I accually learn alot just from looking at the files Imports are easy. yada yada...
